title: Marvin and Lillian Teplitz Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for students participating in the Miramontes Arts and Sciences Program (MASP) in the College of Arts and Sciences at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for students participating in the Miramontes Arts and Sciences Program (MASP) in the College of Arts and Sciences at the University of Colorado Boulder.
